# NSButton.BezelStyle.badge

**Case**

A button style suitable for displaying additional information.

## Declaration

```swift
case badge
```

## Discussion

Use this style of button when you need to provide additional information about something. For example, the count of an item.



For design guidance, see [https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/buttons].

## Informational

- **NSButton.BezelStyle.helpButton**: A round button with a question mark, providing the standard help button look.
- **NSButton.BezelStyle.circular**: A round button that can contain either a single character or an icon.
